p: The study was carried out during 2019 in Taif Governorate, which is located on the slopes of Al-Hijaz Mountains in the western region of Saudi Arabia ( Fig. 1). The climate is arid with precipitation of 181 mm/year as the 30-year mean total annual rainfall, mainly occur between April and November. The average annual temperature is 22.8 °C, with the minimum mean temperatures (15 °C) in January and the maximum (29 °C) in July ( Vincent, 2008).
